commit.description: Git commit hash at time of review (e.g. `git rev-parse HEAD`)

status.description: Overall review outcome: not ok if any P0/P1 issues found, otherwiseok

review_comments.description: A list of reviewer notes, concerns, or suggestions

priority.description: Priority level as a string (for example, '1' for highest priority)

description.description: Markdown text describing the review comment

additional_comments.description: A list of additional comments or notes from the reviewer
